name: P R I M U S
name_original: P R I M U S
description:
Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2

Theme: Rewind

U get trapped inside of a prehistoric museum. Since there is no way out you decide to take a look around while you're there.

Controls
  • WASD - Move
  • Left shift - Sprint
  • Left mouse - Perform action
  • P - Pause game
    •  Adjust settings
Developers

Maxim Eylenbosch - Programming Twitter - Itchio
